title: Inclusive Teacher Capacity Building Program for Adaptive Education Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary education principles or foundational knowledge of special education
context.additional_context: Developing instructional design capabilities that reflect diverse learner needs for pre-service teachers and education majors

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized instructional strategies by analyzing individual student characteristics (learning styles, disability types, etc.)
Learners can measure diverse learning outcomes using flexible assessment tools (e.g., portfolios, observation records).
Learners can propose classroom management strategies for establishing a physically/psychologically inclusive environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
